mapper.select: SELECT alarm.alarm_id AS alarmID, alarm.post_id AS postID, alarm.comment_id AS commentID, comment.comment_content AS alarmContent, users.user_name AS userName, comment.comment_register_time AS registerTime FROM alarms alarm JOIN comments comment ON alarm.comment_id = comment.comment_id JOIN users ON comment.user_id = users.user_id WHERE alarm.tagged_user_id = #{userID} AND users.company_id = #{companyID} UNION SELECT alarm.alarm_id AS alarmID, alarm.post_id AS postID, alarm.comment_id AS commentID, '' AS alarmContent, users.user_name AS userName, post.post_register_time AS registerTime FROM alarms alarm JOIN posts post ON alarm.post_id = post.post_id JOIN users ON post.user_id = users.user_id WHERE alarm.tagged_user_id = #{userID} AND users.company_id = #{companyID} ORDER BY registerTime DESC;
